HiiHAT

Developer Documentation for HiiHAT IDL functions.

Overview Directory File Source Etc Categories Search Index Warnings Help Developer documentation

Directory: build/

.pro files

make_hiihat.pro

Rebuilds all .pro files in the hiihat root directory.

make_hiihat_docs.pro

This script makes all of the idldoc-based documentation for all procedures in hiihat/pro.

mh.pro

Alias for building hiihat procedures that also rebuilds the make_hiihat script
